Express Math Functions

Owning Palette: Arithmetic & Comparison Express VIs

Requires: Base Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the Math functions to create and to perform logarithmic and trigonometric equations and to compute hyperbolic functions and their inverses.

SubpaletteDescription
Express Exponential FunctionsUse the Express Exponential functions to create and perform exponential equations.
Express Hyperbolic FunctionsUse the Express Hyperbolic functions to create and to perform hyperbolic equations.
Express Trigonometric FunctionsUse the Express Trigonometric functions to create and to perform trigonometric equations.
